UniprotID	Q9H3U5-3
Accession	Q9H3U5;B4DGJ8;B4DMR8;B4DU49;B4DWU1;C9JS94;J3KQL7;Q05C07;Q5XKJ1;Q8IVS1;Q8IXG4;Q9H7X1
EntryName	MFSD1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Lysosomal dipeptide transporter MFSD1 (Major facilitator superfamily domain-containing protein 1) (Smooth muscle cell-associated protein 4) (SMAP-4)
GeneName	MFSD1 SMAP4 UG0581B09
Length	426
Function	Lysosomal dipeptide uniporter that selectively exports lysine, arginine or histidine-containing dipeptides with a net positive charge from the lysosome lumen into the cytosol (PubMed:38507452). Could play a role in a specific type of protein O-glycosylation indirectly regulating macrophages migration and tissue invasion (PubMed:30910009). Also essential for liver homeostasis (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Lysosome membrane
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility
